lines.text: What we thought happened was that the Go Wizard tried to cast <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit,</c> and the Stop Wizard cast <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone,</c> right?
A bunch of other stuff happened, but yeah.
Right- but if they never finished that level-up ritual… that means they’re not level 2!
And since those two spells were level 2 spells… that means they <c=#FF00FF>couldn’t have really used them!</c>
Wait, what? But… that guy’s definitely a statue! If it wasn’t a Flesh to Stone backfire, how did that happen?
And if the Go Wizard couldn’t cast Emergency Exit, <c=#FF00FF>why would he set himself on fire?</c>
H-hold it! How do you… how do you know they didn’t complete the ritual?! You’re jumping to conclusions!
I think there’s more than enough evidence to show that, but we might as well nail that down.
